Make the VSMWORK2 virtual machine exempt by using the following commands: ===> RAC RDEFINE VMXEVENT USERSEL.VSMWORK2 ===> RAC RALTER VMXEVENT USERSEL.VSMWORK2 ADDMEM(FOR.C/NOCTL) ===> RAC RALTER VMXEVENT USERSEL.VSMWORK2 ADDMEM(LINK/NOCTL) ===> RAC SETEVENT REFRESH USERSEL.VSMWORK2 RPISET113W TURNING CONTROL ON AUTOMATICALLY FOR: COUPLE RPISET113W TURNING CONTROL ON AUTOMATICALLY FOR:
